meanings.definition: A print made by a process in which an image is painted on a smooth surface and transferred to paper.
meanings.sent1: The artist created beautiful monotypes by painting on a smooth surface.
meanings.sent2: I bought a monotype of a flower to hang in my living room.
meanings.sent3: The monotypes on display at the gallery captured the viewers' attention.
meanings.sent4: Her monotypes were like windows to a different world.
meanings.sent5: The monotypes seemed to jump off the paper with vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: A single print made from a monotype.
meanings.sent1: She carefully framed the monotypes to preserve their uniqueness.
meanings.sent2: The monotype was the only one of its kind in the collection.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked over the stack of monotypes.
meanings.sent4: His smile was a monotype of pure joy.
meanings.sent5: The monotype stood out among the other prints with its bold lines.
